name: WideOpenWest, Inc.
description: WideOpenWest, Inc. (WOW) is a prominent telecommunications provider in the United States, specializing in high-speed internet, digital TV, and phone services. Founded in 2001, WOW has grown to serve millions of customers across various states, with a commitment to delivering reliable and affordable connectivity solutions. The company operates in a highly competitive market, focusing on enhancing the customer experience through innovative technology and superior service. WOW offers a range of internet plans, including fiber-optic options for customers seeking ultra-fast speeds, as well as comprehensive digital television packages that include hundreds of channels and on-demand content. The company's mission is to empower individuals and businesses through exceptional communication services, making them a key player in the ongoing digital transformation. WOW also prioritizes customer satisfaction, providing 24/7 support and a user-friendly online account management system. As the demand for high-speed internet continues to rise, WOW is poised to expand its services and reach new markets, further solidifying its position as a leader in the telecommunications industry.

seo.meta_title: WideOpenWest, Inc. | High-Speed Internet and Digital TV Services
seo.meta_description: Discover WideOpenWest, Inc., a leading telecommunications provider offering high-speed internet, digital TV, and phone services. Explore WOW's commitment to customer satisfaction and innovative technology.

faq.question: What services does WOW offer?
faq.answer: WOW offers high-speed internet, digital TV, and phone services.

faq.question: Where is WOW headquartered?
faq.answer: WOW is headquartered in Englewood, Colorado, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of WOW?
faq.answer: Teresa Elder is the CEO of WideOpenWest, Inc.

faq.question: What types of internet services does WOW provide?
faq.answer: WOW provides high-speed internet and fiber internet services.
